objects.text:
✓ 925 Sterling Silver
✓ Perfect Gift for Her
✓ Certificate of Authenticity
✓ 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant promotional banner showcases a pair of rose gold wreath stud earrings designed for a feminine audience. The layout is diagonally split with a gentle dual-tone gradient background. The upper left features a prominent heading (`heading`) and subheading (`subheading`) in bold serif fonts, establishing the product name. Below it, a bullet list (`description`) highlights key features like authenticity and warranty. The price (`price`) is emphasized in large text, and beneath it lies a bold call-to-action button (`cta`) with a colored rectangle background (`cta_background`). The bottom-right displays a realistic product image (`product_image`) rotated slightly for visual appeal. 

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Pink (#F8E8E8)
- Blush Rose (#FFD1D1)
- Rose Mauve (#9B3B55)
- Deep Plum (#742839)
- Light Coral (#FFF3F3)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features elegant earrings with a dominant rose gold metal base and clear gemstones. The rose gold (#F4A7B9) offers a warm and modern luxury feel, beautifully blended with the sparkling clarity of the gemstones (#FFFFFF). A soft blush pink accent (#F7C4C5) enhances the teardrop-shaped ends, adding a romantic softness to the design. The metallic elements softly reflect light, subtly highlighting both structure and texture, while the gemstones provide striking visual interest. A color palette for an advertisement banner could include rose gold (#F4A7B9), blush pink (#F7C4C5), crystal white (#FFFFFF), and a touch of soft gray (#DADADA) for contrast.
